thread.title: Are Madonna and Sean Penn back together? Oscar-winning actor spotted at another concert -
thread.title_full: Are Madonna and Sean Penn back together? Oscar-winning actor spotted at another concert - San Antonio Express-News

author: Julie Ruff, San Antonio Express-News
title: Are Madonna and Sean Penn back together? Oscar-winning actor spotted at another concert -
text:
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Images Image 1 of / 21 21 Sean Penn and Madonna started dating officially in 1995. Here they are in 1994. (Photo by Ron Galella/WireImage) Sean Penn and Madonna started dating officially in 1995. Here they are in 1994. (Photo by Ron Galella/WireImage) Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Images Image 2 of 21 Actor Sean Penn and singer Madonna, 1985. Actor Sean Penn and singer Madonna, 1985. American musician Madonna and her fiancee, actor Sean Penn, at John F Kennedy Stadium for Live Aid concert where she performed, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, July 13, 1985. Photo: Time & Life Pictures, Getty Images Image 4 of 21 Madonna & Sean Penn jogging on the beach in Malibu right before their wedding on August 16, 1985. Madonna & Sean Penn jogging on the beach in Malibu right before their wedding on August 16, 1985. Photo: Barry King, WireImage Image 5 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna at the "At Close Range" premiere, 1886. Sean Penn and Madonna at the "At Close Range" premiere, 1886. Photo: Ron Galella, WireImage Image 6 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna were newlyweds when they co-starred in Shanghai Surprise in 1986. Sean Penn and Madonna were newlyweds when they co-starred in Shanghai Surprise in 1986. Photo: Metro-Golden-Mayer Image 7 of 21 Madonna and Sean Penn, 1986. (Photo by Vinnie Zuffante/Michael Ochs Archives/Getty Images) Madonna and Sean Penn leave rehearsals for their play 'Goose and Tom Tom' in August 1986 in New York City, New York. (Photo by Vinnie Zuffante/Michael Ochs Archives/Getty Images) Photo: Michael Ochs Archives, Getty Images Image 9 of 21 Actor Sean Penn and singer Madonna on July 13, 1987 leave for an after party for Madonna's Who's That Girl World Tour Concert at Madison Square Garden in New York City. (Photo by Ron Galella, Ltd./WireImage) Actor Sean Penn and singer Madonna on July 13, 1987 leave for an after party for Madonna's Who's That Girl World Tour Concert at Madison Square Garden in New York City. (Photo by Ron Galella, Ltd./WireImage) Photo: Ron Galella, Ltd., WireImage Image 10 of 21 Madonna & Sean Penn in Los Angeles, California, 1987. (Photo by Barry King/WireImage) Madonna & Sean Penn in Los Angeles, California, 1987. (Photo by Barry King/WireImage) Photo: Barry King, Getty Images Image 11 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna relax while attending an AIDS benefit November 11, 1987 in Los Angeles. Sean Penn and Madonna relax while attending an AIDS benefit November 11, 1987 in Los Angeles. Photo: Laura Luongo, Getty Images Image 12 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna during Mike Tyson vs Michael Spinks Fight at Trump Plaza - June 27, 1988 at Trump Plaza in Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States. Sean Penn and Madonna during Mike Tyson vs Michael Spinks Fight at Trump Plaza - June 27, 1988 at Trump Plaza in Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States. Photo: Ron Galella, WireImage Image 13 of 21 Singer Madonna and her husband, actor Sean Penn, walking along a street together, circa 1988. Singer Madonna and her husband, actor Sean Penn, walking along a street together, circa 1988. Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images Image 14 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna divorced in 1989. Soon after, he started dating actress Robin Wright. Here they are in 1990. Sean Penn and Madonna divorced in 1989. Soon after, he started dating actress Robin Wright. Here they are in 1990. Photo: Time & Life Pictures, Getty Images Image 15 of 21 Madonna and director Guy Ritchie married in 2000. Madonna and director Guy Ritchie married in 2000. Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images Image 16 of 21 Guy Ritchie and Madonna were married for eight years before they divorced in 2008. Guy Ritchie and Madonna were married for eight years before they divorced in 2008. Photo: Mike Marsland, WireImage Image 17 of 21 Sean Penn and Robin Wright Penn's divorce was finalized in 2010. Sean Penn and Robin Wright Penn's divorce was finalized in 2010. Photo: LEONARD ORTIZ, MCT Image 18 of 21 Sean Penn and Madonna attend Madonna and Steven Klein secretprojectrevolution at the Gagosian Gallery on September 24, 2013 in New York City. (Photo by Kevin Mazur/Getty Images) Sean Penn and Madonna attend Madonna and Steven Klein secretprojectrevolution at the Gagosian Gallery on September 24, 2013 in New York City. (Photo by Kevin Mazur/Getty Images) Photo: Kevin Mazur, Getty Images Image 19 of 21 Sean Penn and actress Charlize Theron began dating at the end of 2013. Sean Penn and actress Charlize Theron began dating at the end of 2013. Photo: Getty Images For One View Image 20 of 21 Charlize Theron famously ghosted Sean Penn in June 2015, dumping him shortly after this photo was taken at the Cannes Film Festival. (Photo by Samir Hussein/WireImage) Charlize Theron famously ghosted Sean Penn in June 2015, dumping him shortly after this photo was taken at the Cannes Film Festival. (Photo by Samir Hussein/WireImage) Image 21 of 21 Are Madonna and Sean Penn back together? Oscar-winning actor spotted at another concert 1 / 21 Back to Gallery Actor Sean Penn had a front row seat at Madonna's concert in Vancouver, Canada this week, which is his second appearance on her Rebel Heart tour.
At the show, Madonna dedicated her song "Secret" to a special guest. Hmmm, wonder who that could be?
This is how the song starts:
"Things haven't been the same
Since you came into my life
You found a way to touch my soul
And I'm never, ever, ever gonna let it go"
Onstage in Brooklyn last month, Madonna talked about her ex-husband being at her Madison Square Garden Show, saying he told her "he finally appreciated my art."
"And that is what I have to say about marriage. OK? That's [expletive] 30 years later," she said.
Click through the slideshow above to see Madonna and Sean Penn over the years.
